Title: A Christmas Story
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Lacey Marisa Friedman, Lacey Marisa Friedman (story)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Disappointed with her unenthusiastic family during the holidays, Beverly creates "Super Hanukkah" to get them into the spirit, but it's too similar to Christmas. Meanwhile, Adam is annoyed ...
